name: Kana Ka-Boom
description:
Kana Ka-Boom is for those interested in starting their journey of learning the Japanese language, and for those looking for a fun way to practice and retain their Katakana and Hiragana skills.

Fireworks of kana characters launch into the air. By typing the correct letters on your keyboard, you'll light up the sky!

Track your progress and earn medals as you complete lessons, or use free play mode to create a session all your own.

Features:
  • Simple game and interface to get you quickly into practicing your kana
  • Trivia and facts about the Japanese language
  • Spoken characters so you can hear what the kana sound like
  • Freeplay mode to customize your own play session including firework count, speed, sudden death option, and timer options
